1. 광고 효과 증대: 유튜브 쇼핑에 상품을 등록하면 소상공인들은 상품의 광고를 넓은 고객들에게 할 수 있어, 고객의 수를 늘리고 매출을 증가시킬 수 있다.
2. 상품 시청률 증대: 유투브 쇼핑은 소상공인들이 영상을 통해 상품을 소개할 수 있도록 해줌으로써 고객들과의 상품 관심도를 높일 수 있다.
3. 고객 편의성 증대: 유투브 쇼핑을 이용하면 소상공인들은 이미 고객들이 익숙하고 자주 이용하는 플랫폼에서 온라인 판매를 할 수 있어 고객들이
Compare and add domestic Naver and open market

1. Increased Visibility: By listing products on YouTube Shopping, small business owners can increase the visibility of their products to a wider audience, which can lead to more potential customers and increased sales. Similarly, by listing products on Naver Shopping, small business owners can increase the visibility of their products to a local audience in South Korea, which can lead to more potential customers and increased sales.
2. Increased Engagement: YouTube Shopping allows small businesses to use video content to promote their products, which can increase engagement with potential customers and help them make a purchase decision. Similarly, Naver Shopping allows small businesses to use various forms of multimedia content such as images, videos, and reviews to promote their products, which can increase engagement with potential customers.
3. Increased Convenience: By using YouTube Shopping, small businesses can have an online presence and sell their products on a platform that customers are already familiar with and use frequently, which can make the shopping process more convenient for customers and increase the chances of sales. Similarly, by using Naver Shopping, small businesses can have an online presence and sell their products on a platform that customers are already familiar with and use frequently, which can make the shopping process more convenient for local customers and increase the chances of sales.
4. Open marketplaces such as Gmarket, 11st, and Coupang, offer similar benefits in terms of increased visibility, engagement, and convenience, and they are also widely used by domestic customers in South Korea.
5. One key difference is that these domestic platforms are focused on the South Korean market, and have a big user base in the country. However, YouTube Shopping has a global reach, and it can be used to target customers from around the world.

1. Increased Visibility: By listing products on YouTube Shopping, small business owners can increase the visibility of their products to a global audience, which can lead to more potential customers and increased sales. This is especially beneficial for small businesses looking to expand their customer base and reach new markets.
2. Increased Engagement: YouTube Shopping allows small businesses to use video content to promote their products, which can increase engagement with potential customers and help them make a purchase decision. This feature of YouTube Shopping is unique to the platform, and it can be an effective tool for small businesses looking to differentiate themselves and stand out in the market.
3. Increased Convenience: By using YouTube Shopping, small businesses can have an online presence and sell their products on a platform that customers are already familiar with and use frequently, which can make the shopping process more convenient for customers and increase the chances of sales. YouTube is one of the most popular platforms in the world, and it offers small businesses the opportunity to reach a large and diverse customer base.
4. Another benefit of using YouTube Shopping is the ability to integrate it with other Google's services such as Google Analytics, to track performance and get insights about customer behavior and sales.
5. Additionally, YouTube Shopping's integration with Google Ads, allows small businesses to create targeted advertisements which can increase visibility and drive more sales.
When cafe24 small business customers use YouTube shopping, it summarizes the advantages compared to domestic Naver and open markets, and divides them into three

1. Wider Reach: By listing products on YouTube Shopping, small business owners can increase the visibility of their products to a global audience, which can lead to more potential customers and increased sales. This is especially beneficial for small businesses looking to expand their customer base and reach new markets. Compared to domestic Naver and open markets, which are primarily focused on the South Korean market, YouTube Shopping offers a wider reach and the opportunity to target customers from around the world.
2. Unique Engagement: YouTube Shopping allows small businesses to use video content to promote their products, which can increase engagement with potential customers and help them make a purchase decision. This feature of YouTube Shopping is unique to the platform, and it can be an effective tool for small businesses looking to differentiate themselves and stand out in the market.
3. Integrated Tools: By using YouTube Shopping, small businesses can have an online presence and sell their products on a platform that customers are already familiar with and use frequently, which can make the shopping process more convenient for customers and increase the chances of sales. Additionally, YouTube Shopping's integration with Google Ads, allows small businesses to create targeted advertisements and Google Analytics, to track performance and get insights about customer behavior and sales, which are not available in domestic Naver and open markets.

1. Limited Reach: Naver Shopping primarily focuses on the South Korean market, which means that small business owners may have limited reach and may not be able to target customers from outside of South Korea. This can be a disadvantage for small businesses looking to expand their customer base and reach new markets.
2. Limited Engagement: While Naver Shopping allows small businesses to use multimedia content such as images, videos, and reviews to promote their products, it may not be as effective in terms of increasing engagement with potential customers compared to YouTube Shopping's unique video feature.
3. Limited Tools: Naver Shopping may not have the same level of integrated tools and analytics as YouTube Shopping, which can make it more difficult for small businesses to track performance, analyze customer behavior and make data-driven decisions. This can be a disadvantage for small businesses looking to optimize their online sales and marketing strategies.
4. Limited Ecosystem: Naver Shopping is not as widely used as YouTube and it is not part of a broader ecosystem of services that can help small businesses, unlike YouTube Shopping which is integrated with Google services.
5. Limited Flexibility: Naver Shopping may have a more limited flexibility compared to YouTube Shopping in terms of product listing, pricing, and other features, which can limit the ability of small businesses to customize their online sales strategy.
Compare with Naver Smart Store and organize it again

1. Wider Reach: YouTube Shopping allows small business owners to increase the visibility of their products to a global audience, which can lead to more potential customers and increased sales. This is especially beneficial for small businesses looking to expand their customer base and reach new markets. In comparison, Naver Smart Store primarily focuses on the South Korean market, which means that small business owners may have limited reach and may not be able to target customers from outside of South Korea.
2. Unique Engagement: YouTube Shopping allows small businesses to use video content to promote their products, which can increase engagement with potential customers and help them make a purchase decision. This feature of YouTube Shopping is unique and can be an effective tool for small businesses looking to differentiate themselves and stand out in the market. In comparison, Naver Smart Store may not have the same level of engagement opportunities.
3. Integrated Tools: YouTube Shopping offers a variety of integrated tools such as Google Analytics and Google Ads that allow small businesses to track performance, analyze customer behavior and make data-driven decisions. These tools can help small businesses optimize their online sales and marketing strategies. In comparison, Naver Smart Store may not have the same level of integrated tools and analytics.
4. Flexibility: YouTube Shopping offers more flexibility for small businesses in terms of product listing, pricing, and other features, which can enable small businesses to customize their online sales strategy. In comparison, Naver Smart Store may have a more limited flexibility.
5. Ecosystem: YouTube Shopping is part of a broader ecosystem of services that can help small businesses, unlike Naver Smart Store which is a standalone platform.
